create: INSERT INTO drw_webhooks (webhookKey, eventType, url, method, contentType, body, eventData) VALUES ('{key}', '{eventType}', '{url}', '{method}', '{contentType}', '{body}', '{eventData}')
update: UPDATE drw_webhooks SET eventType='{eventType}', url='{url}', method='{method}', contentType='{contentType}', body='{body}', eventData='{eventData}' WHERE webhookKey='{key}'
